extracted-table.table-caption: Statistical peaks in MNI space associated with positive connectivity to the periaqueductal grey and conditioned pain modulation scores, while controlling for time between pain assessment and magnetic resonance imaging.

caption.p: Statistical peaks in MNI space associated with positive connectivity to the periaqueductal grey and conditioned pain modulation scores, while controlling for time between pain assessment and magnetic resonance imaging.

tr.td: 1. Left somatosensory cortex 1 (S1) & 2 (S2), inferior parietal and anterior intraparietal sulcus (aIPS)
2. Right dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (DLPFC), primary and premotor cortices
3. Right primary motor and premotor cortices, S1 & S2
4. Left occipital cortex, V1 and superior parietal

fn.p: Coordinates provided at site of maximum Z-stat.
